EmailTemplate.description: Reminder that SIP ticket has been created but not submitted, this is the second reminder
EmailTemplate.name: SIP Submission needed_2nd reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: SIP ticket {!SIP_Tickets__c.Name} needs to be submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!SIP_Tickets__c.CreatedBy},
This is the second reminder, You have created SIP ticket "{!SIP_Tickets__c.Name} " please select ‘Submit for approval’ in order to obtain necessary approvals.
To go to the ticket please Click Here.
Thank you and have a great day -SIP Team
